column5: The Financial Technology (FinTech) MSc is aimed at students who are looking to gain a broad yet thorough understanding of the financial technology sector. The course features an innovative and interdisciplinary curriculum that helps students to develop the relevant hard and soft skills they will need for careers in FinTech.In addition to traditional finance and IT programming skills, it integrates both real business and practical blended knowledge within the FinTech landscape and the hottest trends in technologies within the disruptive financial sector.
column7: UK Fees: 2022/23 fees TBC*;2021/22 fees - 14250 ; 15450 (with Professional Practice)  International Fees: 2022/23 fees TBC*;2021/22 fees - 17900 ; 18950 (with Professional Practice)
column9: 1 year full time, 18 months extended professional practice
